comments.text: For HSTS sites, we should ignore all user-set options related to safe renegotiation and instead always use the strictest options for them.
comments.raw_text: For HSTS sites, we should ignore all user-set options related to safe renegotiation and instead always use the strictest options for them.

(In reply to Brian Smith (:briansmith, :bsmith, use NEEDINFO?) from comment #0)
> For HSTS sites, we should ignore all user-set options related to safe
> renegotiation and instead always use the strictest options for them.

...and/or refuse renegotiation requests for HSTS domains when the secure renegotiation extension wasn't negotiated.
